built: import-roadmap.sh: awk-based ROADMAP.md parser, extracts phase_num/slug/goal/reqs/success_criteria/deps, ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
import-requirements.sh: awk-based REQUIREMENTS.md parser, extracts req_id/description/priority, ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
get-phase.sh: added --reqs-detail (expands REQ-IDs to descriptions via requirements table join) and --all-phases (lists all phases with slug/status)
company-hierarchy.toon: 325->182 lines (44% reduction), full agent roster, escalation, workflow, context isolation
handoff-schemas.toon: 748->201 lines (73% reduction), 30+ SendMessage schemas with field specifications
teammate-api-patterns.toon: 430->113 lines (74% reduction), team lifecycle, task coordination, fallback cascade
init-db.sh: auto-imports ROADMAP.md, REQUIREMENTS.md, research-archive.jsonl on DB creation
schema.sql: added phases and requirements tables
dv: macOS awk does not support 3-arg match(); used split() fallback for phase number extraction
TOON files created alongside .md originals (not replacing) since 35+ agent/command files reference .md versions
